instruction: En paiyan accident nu hospital call pannudhu da. 1 lakh urgent nu. Bayama irukku.
output: Ayya, panic aagaadheenga! First unga paiyan number ku direct call pannunga. Real hospital ipdi random call panni UPI kekkaadhu. Verify pannunga first, transfer pannaadheenga.

instruction: 'Star Health la irundhu pesuren, unga policy lapse aaidum, renewal premium 15,000 pay pannunga link la' nu message vandhudhu. Policy irukku, renew pannalama?
output: Insurance companies SMS link la payment kekaadhu ayya. Lapse warning formal letter/email varum with reasonable time. Link click pannina fake site - card details pogum. Star Health official website la login panni check pannunga, illa branch ku call pannunga.

instruction: Phone vandhudhu, crying voice la 'Thatha, naan Ravi pesuren, accident aaiduchu, police station la irukken, 50,000 bail vendum, yaar kittayum sollaadha please' nu. En pera voice maadhiri irukku, enna pannanum?
output: Ayya, idhu 'grandparent scam' - voice imitate pannuvaanga or AI voice clone use pannuvaanga. 'Yaar kittayum sollaadha' nu solradhu red flag - verify panna vidaama irukkuraanga. Phone cut pannitu unga pera ORIGINAL number ku call pannunga. Real emergency na family ku theriyum.

instruction: 'Amma, naan Priya pesuren, US la passport stolen, embassy la stuck, urgent aa $2000 vendum Western Union la anuppu' nu call vandhudhu. En ponnu US la dhaan irukka, genuine aa?
output: Ayya, overseas emergency scam idhu. Voice similar aa irundhaalum, verify pannunga. Daughter original number ku WhatsApp video call pannunga. Real embassy situations la different procedures irukkum. Western Union immediate transfer request - big red flag. Verify first, send later.

instruction: 'Ayya, naan unga relative Murugan friend, Murugan daughter wedding ku shortage, 30,000 urgent loan vendum, direct aa kekka kovama irukkum nu en kitta sonnaru' nu call vandhudhu.
output: Ayya, 'relative friend' scam idhu. Murugan ku DIRECT call pannunga verify panna. Real shortage irundhaa Murugan own aa kepparu. 'Direct aa kekka kovama' excuse - verify panna vidama irukkuraanga. Unknown callers through money anuppaadhenga.

instruction: 'SBI technical team la irundhu pesuren ayya, unga account la security issue, AnyDesk install pannunga remote la fix pannidurom' nu call vandhudhu. Bank officer nu sonnaan, nambalam aa?
output: NEVER install AnyDesk ayya! Bank technical team ipdi call pannave pannaadhu. AnyDesk install pannina unga phone/computer full aa paappaanga - banking app open panni all money transfer panniduvaanga. Immediately cut pannunga. Bank branch ku complaint pannunga.

instruction: 'Ayya, naan unga neighbor Lakshmi pesuren, WhatsApp la problem, OTP oru number ku forward aaiduchu, adha sollunga' nu call vandhudhu. Lakshmi voice maadhiri irukku.
output: WhatsApp OTP sollaadhenga ayya! Idhu account takeover scam. OTP kuduthaa unga WhatsApp account thirudiduvaanga, unga contacts kitta kaasu keppanga unga name la. Lakshmi kitta direct poi pesunga - probably avangooda account already hacked.

instruction: SMS vandhudhu - 'Dear Customer, your SBI account will be blocked. Update KYC immediately: [link]'. Reading glasses illa, pera kitta padikka sonneen, genuine aa?
output: Fake SMS ayya! SBI official SMS la suspicious links anuppaadhu. 'Account blocked' bayamudhuthal tactic. Link click pannina fake website - login details enter pannina account empty aagum. Ignore pannunga. Doubt irundhaa SBI branch ku ponga.

instruction: 'RBI Special Bond - 15% guaranteed return, senior citizens ku special allocation' nu broker call pannaan. Government bond safe la, invest pannalama?
output: RBI bonds 15% return kudukkaadhu ayya - current rate 7-8%. 'Special allocation' lie. Fake brokers senior citizens target pannuvaanga - life savings thiruduvanga. RBI bonds through banks only available - not random callers. Ignore this call.

instruction: 'Post Office Super Senior Citizen Scheme - Double your money in 3 years' nu pamphlet vandhudhu. Post office safe la, join pannalama ayya?
output: Post Office schemes money double pannave pannaadhu ayya - 3 years la impossible. Official schemes - SCSS, MIS - fixed returns only. Fake pamphlets senior citizens ku target pannuvaanga. Post office branch ku poi verify pannunga - random pamphlets trust pannaadheenga.

instruction: 'Tirupati TTD la irundhu pesuren ayya, special Hundi donation ku select aairukkeenga, 5000 contribution pannina VIP darshan + prasadam' nu call vandhudhu.
output: TTD random calls panni donation kekaadhu ayya. 'VIP darshan for donation' official scheme illa. Phone donation scam - money pogum, darshan varaadhu. ttdevasthanams.ap.gov.in - official website only. Phone calls ignore pannunga.

instruction: Tirupati darshan ku donation pannunga nu call vandhuchchi ayyaa. TTD la irundhu nu sonnanga ayyaa.
output: TTD phone la donation kekkaadhu ayyaa! Official website la mattum pannunga. Phone call scam ayyaa, paisa pogum.

instruction: 'Ayya, unga horoscope la Shani dosham irukku, next 6 months ku danger. Special puja 11,000 ku pannina dosham pogum' nu astrologer call pannaan.
output: Fear-based scam ayya idhu. Random astrologers phone la panni scare pannuvaanga. 'Danger' solliruvaanga, 'puja' ku kaasu vaanguvaanga - nothing will happen. Trusted family astrologer irundhaa consult pannunga. Unknown callers ignore pannunga.

instruction: ATM la irundhen, oru paiyan 'Ayya, UPI use pannunga easy aa irukkum, naan help pannuren setup panna' nu sonnaan. Phone eduthu enna enna yo pannaan. Aprom account la kaasu kammi.
output: Aiyayo ayya! Stranger kitta phone kudukkaadhu! UPI setup nu solli unga phone access vaangirukkan - PIN paathiruppan or transaction panniruppan. Bank ku poi complaint pannunga, police la FIR pannunga. ATM/bank la staff help only vaangunga, random people illa.

instruction: Veetuku oru aalu vandhaan, 'SBI la irundhu ayya, senior citizen account verification, Aadhaar xerox, passbook, ATM card photo edukanum' nu. ID card kaatinaan, kudukkalama?
output: Bank employees verification ku veetuku varaadhu ayya! ID card fake aa irukkum. Documents kuduthaa account takeover panniduvaanga. 'Verification' bank branch la nadakkum. Door la vara 'bank employees' avoid pannunga. SBI branch ku call panni verify pannunga.

instruction: NEET result varaadhu, panicked aa irukken. 'Management quota seat guaranteed - MBBS 50 lakhs, no donation receipt' nu call vandhudhu. Desperate aa irukken, trust pannalama?
output: 'Guaranteed seat without proper process' impossible. Management quota transparent fees irukkum with receipts. 'No receipt' = illegal = scam. 50 lakhs vaangitu seat varaadhu, complain panna mudiyaadhu (no receipt). Desperation exploit pannuvaanga - official counselling wait pannunga.

instruction: Son ku US admission apply panrom. 'Visa guaranteed, university scholarship arranged, processing fee 2 lakhs' nu consultant solraan. Trust pannalama?
output: 'Visa guaranteed' no one can promise - embassy decision. 'Scholarship arranged' - legitimate scholarships application through varum, agents arrange pannaadhu. 2 lakhs vaangitu basic work um pannaama ghost aaguvaanga. Verified consultants - check reviews, past student references.

instruction: Daughter engineering mudichaa, 'TCS/Infosys direct hiring, training fee 25,000' nu email vandhudhu. Placement kedaikala, idhu genuine opportunity aa?
output: TCS, Infosys training fee kekaadhu - they PAY stipend during training. 'Direct hiring' emails fake. Company career pages la apply pannunga. Training fee kekkura 'IT companies' 100% scam. Daughter ku solla - legitimate companies candidate kitta fee kekaadhu.

instruction: 'SEBI registered advisor, daily 2-3 stocks, 100% profit guaranteed, monthly subscription 10,000' nu call vandhudhu. Side income aagum nu paakkuren.
output: '100% profit guaranteed' - SEBI regulations la illegal claim. Registered advisors ipdi cold calls pannaadhu. Subscription vaangitu random tips kuduppaanga - loss vandha responsibility illa. SEBI registered check pannunga sebi.gov.in la - most callers fake registration claim pannuvaanga.

instruction: 'Pre-launch offer - Plots near Chennai airport, 1 lakh per cent, value double in 2 years' nu ad paathen. Small investment start pannalama?
output: 'Pre-launch' often means no proper approvals yet. 'Near airport' - could be 50km away. 'Value double' - no guarantee in real estate. DTCP/CMDA approval verify pannunga, site physically visit pannunga, legal opinion vaangunga. Paper la nalla theriyum, ground reality different.

instruction: Colleague introduce pannaan - 'Monthly 5000 invest, 12 months la 75,000 return, plus referral bonus.' Initial members good returns vaanguraanga nu sonnaan.
output: Classic Ponzi/MLM structure - early investors ku late investors paisa kuduppaanga. 'Referral bonus' = MLM. Sustainable illa - scheme collapse aagum, last entrants lose pannuvaanga. Colleague genuine aa trust pannirupparu but scheme itself fraud. Politely decline pannunga.

instruction: WhatsApp group la add aanaen - 'Crypto trading signals, forex guaranteed profits, invest minimum 50,000.' Screenshots la lakhs profit kaaturaanga.
output: Screenshots fake or manipulated. 'Guaranteed profits' in trading impossible - if true, why share? Group members praising = part of scam gang. 50,000 invest pannina - initial small withdrawal allow pannuvaanga, then 'invest more to withdraw' trap. SEBI/RBI regulated platforms only use pannunga.

instruction: 'SBI Home Loan pre-approved - 50 lakhs at 6.5%, lowest rate ever, processing fee 15,000 required' nu call vandhudhu. Home vaanga plan irukku, genuine offer aa?
output: Banks cold call la loan push pannaadhu. 6.5% - below current rates, impossible. Processing fee advance kekaadhu - loan amount la deduct pannuvaanga. 'Pre-approved' without application impossible. SBI branch ku direct apply pannunga.

instruction: Old house tenant vacate aagum time, 'Tenant rights lawyer' call pannaan - 'Tenant ku extra compensation vendum, 20,000 legal fee pay pannunga handle pannuren' nu.
output: Random 'lawyers' calling = scam. Tenant disputes Rent Control court la handle aagum. Legitimate lawyers office la meet pannuvaanga, random calls pannaadhu. 'Legal fee advance' vaangitu nothing pannuvaanga. Known lawyers consult pannunga.

instruction: Property register panna porren. 'Sub-registrar office agent' call pannaan - 'Fast track registration, avoid queue, 10,000 extra' nu.
output: Sub-registrar office la official 'agents' kidaiyaadhu. 'Fast track' bribe implication - illegal. Money vaangitu normal queue la nikka veppanga or kaanama poiruvaanga. Official slot booking through appointment vaangunga. 'Agents' avoid pannunga.

instruction: Daughter wedding fix aachhu, budget shortage. 'Wedding loan - instant approval, no income proof, 3 lakh in 24 hours' nu ad paathen.
output: 'No income proof' loans usually illegal lending apps with 100%+ interest. '24 hours disbursement' - desperation exploit pannuvaanga. Harassment, contact list access, morphed photo blackmail varum later. Bank personal loan apply pannunga - legitimate lenders income verify pannuvaanga.

instruction: Office la irukken, call vandhudhu - 'Unga father collapse, [Hospital Name] la admit, immediate deposit 80,000, else treatment start pannaadhu' nu.
output: FIRST - Father ku call pannunga, mother ku call pannunga, home ku call pannunga. Real hospitals treatment start pannitu payment pesuvaanga - especially emergency. 'Immediate deposit else no treatment' pressure tactic. 2 minutes verification worth it.

instruction: Father passed away, LIC claim file panrom. 'LIC claim specialist' call pannaan - 'Fast processing, documents handle pannuren, 5% commission' nu.
output: LIC claim process straightforward - specialist vendaam. 5% of 10 lakhs = 50,000 - significant amount. Claim agents documents misuse pannalam. LIC branch la direct submit pannunga - they guide for free. 'Specialists' mostly scammers.

instruction: Extra income ku 'Amazon/Flipkart product listing work - daily 2 hours, earn 20,000/month, registration 5,000' nu ad paathen.
output: Amazon/Flipkart ipdi outsource pannaadhu. Registration fee = scam. Initial la small tasks, small payments kuduppaanga. Then 'premium access' ku more investment keppanga. Task-based work from home offers 99% scam.

instruction: Company layoff aachhu. 'Labour department' call pannaan - 'Wrongful termination compensation 2 lakhs eligible, processing fee 10,000' nu.
output: Labour department suo motu call pannaadhu. Compensation court through varum, not phone calls. 'Processing fee' government departments kekkaadhu. Genuine grievance irundhaa Labour Commissioner office ku direct ponga.

instruction: LinkedIn la 'HR from Google/Microsoft' message - 'Your profile selected, initial interview fee 5,000 for assessment platform access.' Dream job opportunity, pay pannalama?
output: Google, Microsoft - NO interview fees. 'HR' direct message - fake recruiter. Assessment platforms company provide pannum free. LinkedIn fake recruiters mass aa irukkaanga. Official career pages la apply pannunga, DM job offers ignore pannunga.

instruction: Bro, LinkedIn la Google HR message pannaan, interview fee 5K nu. Legit aa da?
output: Fake da! Google interview fee kekaadhu - they'll pay you for onsite travel. LinkedIn la fake recruiters romba irukkaanga. Official careers.google.com la apply pannu.

instruction: US job search panren. 'H1B sponsorship guaranteed, employer tie-up ready, processing fee $3000' nu consultancy solrudhu.
output: H1B lottery-based - 'guaranteed' impossible. Legitimate employers employee fee pay pannuvaanga, candidate kekaadhu. $3000 vaangitu fake offer letter kuduppaanga - visa reject, money gone. Direct company applications, LinkedIn jobs - legitimate path.

instruction: Upwork la client - 'Big project 50,000, but need you to buy specific software first, I'll reimburse with payment.' Software ku 10,000 upfront kekkuraan.
output: Classic freelance scam. Legitimate clients project tools provide pannuvaanga or cost include pannuvaanga in budget. 'Buy first, reimburse later' - reimbursement varaadhu. Upwork outside payment request = violation anyway. Decline and report.

instruction: Tinder/Bumble la match aanaen - 2 months pesinom, 'stuck abroad, wallet stolen, 20,000 need for hotel, will return when back.' Photos, video calls - genuine feel aagudhu.
output: Classic romance scam pattern. Video calls - pre-recorded or accomplice. 'Emergency abroad' - untraceable request. 2 months investment creates emotional bond - hard to say no. NEVER send money to people you haven't met in person. If genuine, they have other options - embassy, family.

instruction: BharatMatrimony la profile match aachhu - 'Software engineer in US, coming to India next month.' Now 'visa emergency, 50,000 need, will return personally.'
output: NRI matrimonial scams very common. 'Coming next month' keeps hope alive. Emergency always before meeting. Video call insist pannunga - excuses vandhaa red flag. Never send money before meeting in person with family verification.

instruction: Matrimony site la US ponnu, visa problem nu 50K kekkudhu saami. Genuine aa?
output: Scam saami! Meet pannama, family verify pannama money anuppaadheenga. 'Visa emergency' classic excuse. Video call request pannunga - avoid pannaa scam confirm.

instruction: Instagram la 'model' DM pannaa - chatting aachhu, 'exclusive content subscription 2000/month' nu, payment link anuppunaa.
output: Fake profiles using stolen photos. 'Exclusive content' sites usually malware or card theft. Payment pannina - more demands, blackmail possibility. Reverse image search pannunga photos - vera sites la irukkum. Don't pay strangers for 'content.'

instruction: Instagram ad - 'Made 10 lakhs in 3 months with crypto trading bot, DM for access.' Friend um try pannaan, initial la profit vandhudhu nu sonnaan.
output: Initial profits = their own money returning, creates trust. 'Trading bot' access ku investment keppanga. Friend um eventually lose pannuvaan - Ponzi structure. Crypto invest pannanum na - Binance, WazirX legitimate exchanges use pannunga, 'bots' and 'signals' avoid.

instruction: Machan, crypto bot la friend profit pannaan nu sonnan, try pannalama?
output: Bro, initial profit trap da. Friend own money dhaan return varudhu. More invest panna solluvaanga, then ghost. Binance, CoinDCX - legit exchanges use pannu, Instagram bots scam da.

instruction: 'IPL match prediction - 100% accurate, join Telegram VIP group, 5000 subscription.' Demo predictions correct aa vandhudhu.
output: Demo predictions - they send opposite predictions to different groups, one group always 'wins.' VIP group la 'invest more for insider info' demands varum. Match fixing illegal anyway. Cricket betting apps - most unlicensed, money recovery impossible.

instruction: 'Start your e-commerce business, we handle everything - products, delivery, marketing. Investment 1 lakh, returns 50,000/month.'
output: Legitimate dropshipping requires YOUR effort - product selection, marketing, customer service. 'We handle everything + guaranteed returns' = Ponzi. 1 lakh vaangitu fake dashboard kaatuppaanga with 'profits' - withdrawal impossible. Real business = real work, no guarantees.

instruction: Gym friend introduce pannaan - 'Health supplements, become distributor, recruitment bonus + product sales commission, 25,000 starter kit.'
output: MLM red flags - expensive starter kit, emphasis on recruitment over sales. 'Bonus for recruiting' = pyramid structure. Products usually overpriced, hard to sell. 95%+ MLM participants lose money. Politely decline, friendship maintain pannunga but business avoid.

instruction: Urgent 30,000 vendum. Play Store la 'Instant Loan - No Documents' app download potten. Loan vandhudhu but interest 50% per month, daily harassment calls.
output: Illegal loan apps - RBI registered illa. Installation la contacts, photos access vaanguvaanga. Default pannaa - contacts ku call, morphed photos threat. Already trapped aa - cyber crime complaint pannunga, don't pay more (harassment won't stop with payment). RBI registered NBFCs only use pannunga.

instruction: 'HDFC Credit Card - Limit increase 3 lakhs approved, OTP confirm pannunga' nu call vandhudhu. Increase useful aa irukkum, proceed pannalama?
output: Banks OTP kekaadhu limit increase ku. OTP kuduthaa - transactions unauthorized aagidum. Limit increase app through apply pannalam, auto-approved based on usage. Phone calls la OTP - NEVER share. Cut pannu, HDFC app check pannu.

instruction: SMS - 'Income Tax Refund Rs.23,450 approved. Update bank account: [link] to receive refund.' Refund expect pannuren, click pannalama?
output: IT department refund registered bank account ku automatic credit aagum - link update vendaam. SMS links phishing sites. Login details enter pannina - real IT account hacked, bank details stolen. incometax.gov.in direct login panni check pannunga.

instruction: 'Premium Spotify/Netflix free - Download APK from [link]' nu Telegram la share aachhu. Official app paid, idhu free alternative aa?
output: Pirated APKs malware contain pannum - banking trojans, keyloggers. 'Free premium' bait. Phone data full aa steal aagum. Legitimate apps - Play Store/App Store only. Piracy shortcuts la malware risk always irukku.

instruction: Suddenly phone 'No Network' for hours. Network vandra time - bank OTPs went somewhere, 2 lakhs transferred. OTP yaarkum sollala, eppidi?
output: SIM swap fraud - your data (Aadhaar, phone, bank) leaked/bought, scammers duplicate SIM vaanguvaanga telecom store la with fake ID. Your SIM deactivates, OTPs go to them. Immediately when network lost - call bank, call telecom. Enable SIM lock, app-based 2FA use pannunga.

instruction: Telegram group la join aanaen - 'Like YouTube videos, earn 50 per like, daily 500-1000 possible.' Initial la payment vandhudhu, now 'premium task ku 5000 invest' nu solraanga.
output: Classic task scam - initial payments hook you. Premium investment ku endless demands varum - 'withdraw ku more invest pannu.' Students thousands lose pannuraanga. STOP NOW - don't invest more. Already paid aa - recovery very difficult.

instruction: Bro, Telegram task job la first 500 vandhudhu. Now 5K invest pannanum advanced tasks ku nu. Worth aa da?
output: STOP da! Initial payment bait - 5K pottaa '10K more for withdrawal' nu solluvaanga. Classic scam, students mass aa maatikuraanga. Whatever you paid - consider lost, don't pay more.

instruction: 'Work from hostel - Data entry job, daily 3 hours, monthly 15,000, registration 1000' nu Instagram ad. Pocket money ku useful, join pannalama?
output: Legitimate data entry jobs registration fee kekaadhu. 1000 vaangitu simple work kuduppaanga initially - then 'software fee', 'certification fee' more demands. Monthly 15,000 for 3 hours - too good, basic math fail. Internshala, LinkedIn verified internships try pannunga.

instruction: 'Write product reviews, 100 per review, unlimited earning' nu website paathen. 500 registration fee.
output: Review writing legit irundhaalum - registration fee kekaadhu. Paid review sites direct pay pannuvaanga. 500 fee site - either no payment later or endless 'premium membership' demands. Swagbucks, Toluna - legit survey sites irukku, free registration.

instruction: 'BGMI Tournament - Entry fee 200, prize pool 50,000' nu Discord la post paathen. Entry fee pay potten, tournament nadakkala, admin kaanama poyittaan.
output: Fake gaming tournaments Discord, Telegram la romba varum. Entry fee collect pannitu server delete panniduvaanga. Verified organizers - Skyesports, Nodwin - trust pannunga. Random Discord admins avoid. Entry fee low nu risk worth illa.

instruction: Instagram la 'Valorant account with rare skins, 2000 only (worth 10,000)' nu post paathen. Buy pannalama?
output: Account selling - game ToS violation, ban risk anyway. Payment pannina - account credentials varaadhu or credentials vandhu password change panniduvaanga. Skins officially game store la vaangunga. Third-party account sales almost always scam.

instruction: 'BGMI/FF unlimited UC hack - Download APK' nu YouTube video paathen. Free UC kedaikuma?
output: 'Hack APKs' malware contain pannum - phone data steal, banking apps access. UC/diamonds server-side - hacking impossible. Account ban guaranteed if detected. Game integrity maintain pannunga - play fair or pay official.

instruction: Followed celebrity page 'iPhone 15 Giveaway - Follow + Tag 3 friends + Pay 500 shipping to claim.' I won nu DM vandhudhu. Legitimate aa?
output: Fake celebrity pages - verification badge check pannunga. Real giveaways shipping fee kekaadhu. 500 pay pannina - more fees varum, iPhone varaadhu. 'Tag friends' = scam spread mechanism. Ignore fake giveaways.

instruction: 'Get Instagram Blue Tick - 5000 only, guaranteed in 7 days' nu DM vandhudhu. Influencer aaganum, verification useful.
output: Instagram verification free - eligibility criteria meet pannunga. 'Paid verification' scammers account access vaanguvaanga - hijack or scam others using your account. Blue tick Instagram directly kudukum, third-party impossible. Don't share login credentials.

instruction: '10,000 Instagram followers 500 only' nu website paathen. Growth ku useful aa irukkum.
output: Purchased followers - bots or inactive accounts. Instagram purge regularly - followers drop. Engagement rate drop = algorithm punishment. Account credentials kuduthaa - account steal possibility. Organic growth focus pannunga, shortcuts backfire.

instruction: 'Complete Web Development Course - Get job in 3 months, course fee 2000 (worth 20,000)' nu ad. Career ku useful, join pannalama?
output: 'Job guaranteed' no course can promise. 2000 course - usually outdated content, no proper support. Free quality content - freeCodeCamp, Coursera (audit), YouTube - available. Paid courses - Udemy sales (500-1000), verified platforms use pannunga.

instruction: 'Virtual internship + Certificate from [Big Company Name], registration 1500' nu LinkedIn post.
output: Real companies internship fee kekaadhu - they pay stipend. 'Certificate from Big Company' - fake or unofficial. LinkedIn la fake internship posts common. Official company career pages la apply pannunga. Paid certificates value illa in job market.

instruction: Email vandhudhu - 'Congratulations! Selected for XYZ Scholarship 50,000, processing fee 2000 required.'
output: Legitimate scholarships processing fee kekaadhu. 'Selected' without application - impossible. Email links phishing sites. NSP (National Scholarship Portal), university official scholarships apply pannunga - all free process.

instruction: Close friend persistent aa 'business opportunity' explain pannaan - 'Amway/Vestige join pannu, both of us earn, just 15,000 starter kit.'
output: Friend genuine aa believe panniruppaan - but MLM structure problematic. 95%+ participants lose money (FTC data). Friendship strain aagum if you refuse or fail. Research MLM statistics, politely decline. Real friendship survives business rejection.

instruction: College senior 'insider crypto tips' share pannaan - 'This coin 10x confirmed, invest now, I'll guide.' Trust pannalama?
output: 'Insider tips' in crypto - usually pump and dump. Senior buy panniruppaan already, your buying increases price, senior sells, you hold worthless coins. Seniors um scammed aagiruppaan, chain continues. Own research pannunga, 'tips' avoid.

instruction: YouTube video paathen - 'Free V-Bucks generator, unlimited Fortnite currency, link in description.'
output: 'Generators' work pannaadhu - game currency server-side stored. Links malware, surveys that steal data, or 'human verification' scams. Parents credit card details risk. Never click 'free currency' links - all fake.

instruction: Discord DM vandhudhu - 'Valorant Riot employee, your account flagged for review, login here to verify: [link].'
output: Game companies DM through contact pannaadhu. 'Employee' DMs always fake. Link = phishing site, login details steal. Report and block. Two-factor authentication enable pannunga all gaming accounts la.

instruction: Discord la someone 'trade skins' offer pannaan. I go first nu sonnaan since 'I have more reputation.'
output: 'I have reputation, you go first' classic scam line. Trade pannina - they block you, items gone. Use official trading systems with protection. Discord/random trades = high scam risk. If seems unfair, don't trade.

instruction: Instagram la someone friend aachhu - same interests, daily chat, now 'send your photo, I'll send mine' nu kekuraan. Vera personal questions um kekkuraan.
output: DANGER - this is grooming pattern. Adults pretend as teens, build trust, ask for photos/info. NEVER share personal photos, address, school name with online strangers. Tell parents/trusted adult immediately. Block and report the account.

instruction: TikTok/Instagram la 'Send 1000 to this UPI, get 2000 back - money doubling challenge' nu viral aagudhu. Friends try pannuvaanga.
output: Money doubling impossible - basic logic. 'Viral' because scammers promote heavily. Friends who 'got money' - either lying or part of scam. 1000 anuppina - gone forever. Report such videos, warn friends.

instruction: Instagram DM - 'We love your content! Become brand ambassador, free products + commission. Just pay 500 shipping for starter kit.'
output: Real brand deals - they pay you, you don't pay. 'Shipping for free products' contradiction. 500 pay pannina - cheap products or nothing. Real influencer deals through proper contracts, not random DMs to small accounts.

instruction: Oru email vandhuchu 'Your company server is compromised, immediate security audit needed. Click here to download security patch' nu IT department name la. Company la security team irukke, ipo enna pannanum?
output: Classic phishing targeting IT professionals! Real security alerts come through internal channels, not random emails. Forward to actual security team, don't click any links. Attackers know IT people have admin access - that's why they target you specifically.

instruction: LinkedIn la oru IT recruiter message pannirukku 'Senior Developer role at Microsoft, $150K package. Send resume and current company credentials for background verification.' Legit recruiter aa?
output: Never share company credentials for 'background check'! Real recruiters ask for resume, not passwords. Microsoft recruits through official channels with @microsoft.com emails. This is credential harvesting disguised as recruitment.

instruction: WhatsApp message vandhuchu 'Your GitHub account reported for copyright violation. Verify identity within 24 hours or account suspended. Click link.' GitHub account work ku important, verify pannalama?
output: GitHub sends violations to registered email, not WhatsApp! Check github.com directly for any notifications. This phishing attempt wants your GitHub credentials - once stolen, attackers can access all your repositories and inject malicious code.

instruction: Email vandhuchu company domain hosting provider name la 'Your domain hosting expired. Pay 15,000 immediately or website goes down.' Panic aagudhu, en company website down aagidumaa?
output: Check your actual hosting dashboard - not through email links. Real providers send multiple reminders before expiry. Scammers buy expired domain lists and target businesses. Verify sender email domain carefully - often slight misspellings like 'godady.com' instead of 'godaddy.com'.

instruction: Call vandhuchu 'This is Infosys IT security team. We detected unauthorized access from your credentials. Share OTP to verify your identity.' Naanum Infosys la dhaan velai paakkuren, genuine call aa?
output: Real IT security teams use internal communication, never ask OTP over phone. They can verify you through company systems. Call your manager or security team directly using known numbers. Internal breach attempts often come disguised as security calls.

instruction: Telegram group la job posting paathen '5 LPA remote job, interview tomorrow. Pay 2000 for technical assessment platform access.' Salary good, but assessment ku pay pannanum - legitimate aa?
output: Companies never charge for assessments! HackerRank, CodeSignal - all free for candidates. Scammers target tech job seekers with 'assessment fees'. Real tech companies invest in hiring, don't charge candidates. Report and leave such groups.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'AWS billing issue detected, verify card details to prevent service termination' nu AWS logo use panni. Company AWS use pannudhu, check pannalama?
output: Always access AWS through console.aws.amazon.com directly! AWS sends alerts through console and verified email, never asks card details via email. Check CloudWatch billing alerts. This is classic cloud service impersonation targeting DevOps engineers.

instruction: LinkedIn premium DM vandhuchu 'We need urgent freelancer for US project, 5000 USD/month. Share bank details for advance payment.' Too good to be true aa?
output: Legitimate clients use proper freelancing platforms or company contracts. 'Advance payment needing bank details' is money mule recruitment. You could become complicit in money laundering. Real projects have clear scope, contracts, payment milestones.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'TCS requires your old employee data for tax compliance. Fill this form with PAN, previous salary details.' Munna TCS la work pannen, compliance ku genuine aa?
output: Ex-employers contact through official HR email, not WhatsApp. TCS has Form 16 data, doesn't need you to fill forms. This is PAN/financial data harvesting. If genuinely needed, visit TCS HR portal or call official numbers.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Your Jira license expiring, IT head approved renewal. Click to pay 50,000 from company account.' IT head name mention pannirukkanga, process pannalama?
output: Business Email Compromise (BEC) attack! Scammers research company structure, impersonate executives. Real renewals go through procurement, not random emails. Verify with IT head directly through phone/internal chat. Never pay based on email alone.

instruction: Phone vandhuchu 'Namaskaaram doctor, IMA meeting registration urgent. Pay 5000 now, tomorrow deadline. UPI ID sollunga.' IMA meeting genuine aa, pay pannalama?
output: IMA registrations go through official website and branch offices, not random phone calls. Call your local IMA branch directly to verify any meeting. Scammers use professional association names to target doctors knowing they'll respond to medical authority.

instruction: WhatsApp message vandhudhu 'NABH inspection scheduled for your clinic. Pre-inspection fee 25,000 required. Transfer immediately to avoid penalty.' NABH accreditation process la idhu varudhaa?
output: NABH never asks for fees via WhatsApp! All NABH communications through official email and portal. Inspection fees paid through official channels after proper application. This targets healthcare facility owners - verify from nabh.co website directly.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Medical Council license renewal overdue. Pay 15,000 penalty now or license suspended from tomorrow.' Panic aagudhu, enna pannanum doctor?
output: State Medical Council sends renewal notices months in advance through registered mail. Check NMC/SMC portal for actual status. Scammers create urgency targeting doctors' fear of license issues. Never pay without verifying from official council website.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Conference registration - International Medical Symposium Dubai. Early bird 50,000, free accommodation. Limited seats.' Attend pannalama?
output: Verify conference from official medical body websites. Legitimate conferences listed in IMA/specialty association calendars. 'Free accommodation with paid registration' is common scam pattern. Check if organizers are recognized medical institutions.

instruction: SMS vandhudhu 'Drug license renewal pending. Pay 8000 online to avoid clinic seal.' Drug license matter serious, pay pannidlama?
output: Drug licenses renewed through State Drug Control department, not SMS links. Check actual renewal date in your license. Visit drug controller office or official portal. Scammers know doctors fear drug license issues - exploiting regulatory anxiety.

instruction: WhatsApp group add pannidaanga 'Hospital accreditation assistance. We help with NABH/NABL. 1 lakh consultation fee, 100% success.' Clinic ku accreditation venum, join pannalama?
output: Real accreditation consultants work through proper contracts and meetings. WhatsApp groups promising 'guaranteed accreditation' are scams. NABH/NABL accreditation requires genuine compliance, no shortcuts. Contact official empaneled consultants from NABH website only.

instruction: Call vandhuchu 'Ministry of Health survey about clinic facilities. Need your registration number, PAN, bank account for incentive payment.' Government survey aa?
output: Government surveys done through official department visits, not random calls asking bank details. Health Ministry uses NIC portals, not phone calls for data collection. Survey incentives never need bank account upfront. Verify from district health office.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'CME credits verification failed. Pay 12,000 for audit clearance or face council action.' CME credits important, pay pannidlama?

output: NCTE registration done through colleges and official NCTE portal, not individual payments. Inform your principal this is a scam. NCTE fees go through institutional channels, not individual teacher payments. Check ncte.gov.in for genuine requirements.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Business loan pre-approved. 10 lakh at 8% interest. Processing fee 25,000.' Business ku loan venum, apply pannalama?

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Trademark violation complaint against your business. Pay 50,000 settlement or face legal action.' Trademark issue vandhududhaa, settle pannidlama?

instruction: WhatsApp message 'CNG subsidy scheme for auto drivers. Register with 2000, get 10000 subsidy.' Fuel cost save aagum, apply pannalama?

instruction: WhatsApp forward 'Free tractor scheme government. Register with Aadhaar and 5000 token.' Tractor kedaikum aa really?

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Gold testing certification course. 15,000 for BIS approved tester certificate.' Idhu useful certification aa?

instruction: WhatsApp message 'GST special scheme for jewellers. 5000 registration for reduced compliance.' GST compliance easy aagum aa?

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'FSSAI license renewal urgent. 8000 fee or restaurant sealed tomorrow.' FSSAI license irukku, urgent aa renew pannanum?

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Fire safety certificate renewal. 5000 online payment or inspection failed.' Fire safety matter serious, pay pannidlama?

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Reality show audition fee 2000. Selected get 1 lakh signing amount.' Reality show la chance irukka?

instruction: SMS vandhudhu 'Film industry card registration. 3000 fee for FEFSI/TFPC membership.' Industry card kedaikum aa?

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Police welfare fund contribution audit. Pay 2000 to clear discrepancy.' Welfare fund la issue irukka?

instruction: WhatsApp message 'CAPF canteen credit offer. Pay 1000 registration for 5000 credit limit.' Canteen la benefit kedaikum aa?

instruction: SMS vandhudhu 'Security guard license renewal. Pay 500 online or license cancelled.' PSARA license renew pannanum aa?
